sentences.english: You’re the most enigmatic person I know.
sentences.chinese: 你是我認識的人中最高深莫測的人。

sentences.english: But women's intuition is likely more biological than mystical.
sentences.chinese: 但女性的自覺更多的是她的生理本能，而非高深莫測。

sentences.english: C. :Women like to pretend they r complicated. I know better.
sentences.chinese: 我很瞭解女人，她們都喜歡裝得高深莫測。

definition: lit. doesn't (even) enter a single aperture (of one's head)/I don't understand a word (idiom)/it's all Greek to me
devotion to righteousness that inspires reverence (idiom)
lit. to play the lute to a cow (idiom)/fig. offering a treat to an unappreciative audience/to cast pearls before swine/caviar to the general/to preach to deaf ears/to talk over sb's head
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
lit. a deluge of heavenly flowers (idiom)/fig. extravagant embellishments/hype
abstruse/profound mystery/the mysteries of the universe
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
(of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
